events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their car and filed a claim for damages sustained in the accident.
The claim was categorized under auto accident coverage after reviewing initial claim details and accident report.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to assist the customer and manage claim processing steps.
The claim was officially acknowledged and confirmation was sent to the policy holder promptly.
Requested police report, vehicle damage photos, and driverâ€™s license copy for verification and processing.
The customer submitted all required documents including accident photos and official police report.
The investigation team commenced a detailed review of the collision circumstances and damage extent.
Investigation confirmed the details match with claim statements and accident report, no discrepancies found.
A settlement offer was made to the customer covering repair costs and associated expenses as per policy.
Customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed appreciation for prompt handling.
The claim was formally approved by the claims manager following positive customer feedback.
Payment was processed and issued to the customer's account to cover all approved damages promptly.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation of payment receipt and customer satisfaction.
All claim-related documents and communications were archived for future reference and record keeping.
